vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.16;
son of: Jehallelel (H3094);
brother of: Ziph (H2128J), Ziphah (H2129) and Tiria (H8493)
§ Asareel = "God holds"
a descendant of Judah through Caleb
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jahaleel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞撒列 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "神持守"
猶大的後裔 (代上 4:16)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚撒列 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "神持守"
犹大的后裔 (代上 4:16)
